mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as RNUM,s.* from (SELECT NT_NUM, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, to_char(NT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')NT_DATE, NT_TYPE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NT_NUM desc)s) WHERE RNUM >= #{START_NUM} AND RNUM <= #{END_NUM}
SELECT NT_NUM, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_DATE, NT_TYPE FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_NUM = #{NT_NUM}
